data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trager, James C. (2013): Global revision of the dulotic ant genus Polyergus (Hymenoptera: Formicidae, Formicinae, Formicini). Zootaxa 3722 (4): 501-548, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3722.4.5
